name: Morgenthaler Ventures
overview:
Morgenthaler Ventures has been in the venture capital business for more than 40 years, steadily investing through every market cycle.

Among the many Morgenthaler-funded companies that have gone public or were acquired are: Apple, Atria, Brion, Illustra Technologies, IPC â€“ The Hospitalist Company, Medaphis, Microchip, New Focus, NexTag, NEXTEL, Nuance Communications, Perclose, Premisys, Ribozyme Pharmaceuticals, Synopsys and VeriFone.
